column5: Welcome to The Cottage, a home from a re-purposed building that had many previous lives including a flower shop. In the style reminiscent of a German Sunday House, this petite home will surprise you with spacious gracious living. All rooms are professionally decorated with antiques in an eclectic yet sophisticated style that honors the spirit of the Texas countryside. Non-Peak Rates: $145 per night for 2 people/$65 per additional persons. Peak Rates: $165 per night/$65 per additional persons.
column8: The Cottage - New Ulm - 20 Miles from Round Top
